title: Switching emails?
body:
So my friend can't access her email anymore because her saved password was no longer saving and she didn't store it anywhere. She wants to keep an email available just in case she happens to forget her password on League if she stops playing for a while. Is there any way she can switch her email to a new one?

Btw she's lvl 4, so she can't write on the forums.

replies.body: If your friend has ever lost access to her account or needs any kind of help with account matters, they'll need to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and selecting "I need help recovering my account". They'll need to stay *logged out* of their account as well!
Alright, thanks! I'll let her know
